Returns: A feature supported by this device at a given timestamp.
getFeatureName().Description: Getter for the features name that was available on this device. Possible values returned from this method are taken from the "uses-feature" tags available in the Android manifest.

Returns: The last time (in milliseconds since Epoch) that this device became connected.
getLastConnectionTimestampMillis().Description: Getter for the last connection timestamp of this device.

ClassDesc: Data interface for retrieving device feature history.
